Package marauroa.server.game.db

package marauroa.server.game.db
high level database access. By using the data access objects in this package, you don't have to worry about how the database works and what SQL is.
Note: Please do not instantiate a DAO class directly but use DAORegister.get().get(...DAO.class). This way it is possible for games to implement subclasses that are used instead of the original ones.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    AccountDAO
    data access object for accounts
    AccountLinkDAO
    data access object for account links
    BanListDAO
    data access object the ban list
    CharacterDAO
    data access object for characters
    DAORegister
    Keeps track of the DAOs (data access objects) to use.
    DatabaseFactory
    Utility class for choosing the right player database.
    GameEventDAO
    data access object for game events
    LoginEventDAO
    data access object for login events
    LoginEventDAO.LoginEvent
    Class to store the login events
    LoginSeedDAO
    data access object for login seeds
    RPObjectDAO
    data access object for RPObjects
    RPZoneDAO
    data access object for RPZones
    StatisticsDAO
    data access object for statistics.
